results.title: Rationale for the use of metformin and exercise to counteract statin-associated side effects.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ and exercise training share many pathways that could potentially contrast @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009135 @@@SAMS@@@ and @DISEASE_Myoclonic_Epilepsies_Progressive @DISEASE_MESH:D020191 @@@NOD@@@.

results.title: Mechanisms and effects of metformin on skeletal muscle disorders
results.text_hl: Due to the limited treatment methods available for skeletal @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009135 @@@muscle diseases@@@, the above mentioned positive effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ for their treatment is encouraging.

results.title: Potential Benefits of Combined Statin and Metformin Therapy on Resistance Training Response in Older Individuals
results.text_hl: However, it has also been suggested that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may act as a possible protectant of statin-related @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009135 @@@muscle symptoms@@@.

results.title: Moderate exercise combined with metformin-treatment improves mitochondrial bioenergetics of the quadriceps muscle of old female Wistar rats.
results.text_hl: Our research group has shown that the combined treatment of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MTF@@@) and exercise has beneficial effects for preventing @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009135 @@@muscle loss@@@ and @DISEASE_Embolism_Fat @DISEASE_MESH:D004620 @@@fat accumulation@@@, by modulating the redox state.

results.title: Sarcopenia in independent oldest-old individuals treated for diabetes, with or without metformin: a case-control study.
results.text_hl: BACKGROUND: @DISEASE_Sarcopenia @DISEASE_MESH:D055948 @@@Sarcopenia@@@ is a common condition in the elderly, especially in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetics@@@ (@DISEASE_Myotonic_Dystrophy @DISEASE_MESH:D009223 @@@DM@@@). @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MTF@@@), known to reduce @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@ levels, can also be a therapeutic intervention in @DISEASE_Osteoporosis @DISEASE_MESH:D010024 @@@age-related diseases@@@, although it may contribute to @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009135 @@@muscle loss@@@.

citations.NLM: Aguiar MB, Kim S, Bortoluzzo AB, Di Tommaso AB, Cendoroglo MS, Colleoni GWB. Sarcopenia in independent oldest-old individuals treated for diabetes, with or without metformin: a case-control study. Acta Diabetol. 2025 Jan 31;():. PMID: 39888448

results.title: Maternal Metformin Treatment during Gestation and Lactation Improves Skeletal Muscle Development in Offspring of Rat Dams Fed High-Fat Diet
results.text_hl: Decreased @GENE_MYF6 @GENE_4618 @@@MRF4@@@ expression in SM, @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009135 @@@muscle dysfunction@@@ and mitochondrial vacuolization were observed in weaned HF-CT males, while maternal @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ normalized them.
